availableWhenLive: Chat will be available when the activity starts.

directory.noGuestsDescription: No other guests have opted into chat yet. Check back later!
directory.optInDescription: Enable guest chat in your settings to connect with other guests staying here.
directory.title: Guest Directory

directMessagingUnavailable: Direct messaging is unavailable for this guest.
directMessagingUnavailableDescription: Both guests must be confirmed on the same stay, opt into chat, and not be blocked.
markPresenceToChat: Mark your presence on the activity page to start chatting.
